title: TVT-Secur Versus TVT-Obturator: A Randomized Trial of Suburethral Sling Operative Procedures

operands.value: are at least 18 years of age
demonstrate a positive cough stress test during complex multi-channel urodynamic testing
demonstrate impact of stress urinary incontinence on quality of life questionnaire
are able to comprehend and sign a written informed consent
understand and are willing to comply with the study requirements, including agreeing to be available for the follow-up evaluations
are psychologically stable and suitable for interventions determined by the investigator
are ambulatory and able to use a toilet independently
must have minimum age of 18 Years
are pregnant or planning to become pregnant during the study or in the future
have an elevated post-void residual (defined as PVR > 100cc)
have a bleeding condition or are on anti-coagulant therapy
have multiple sclerosis or other progressive neurological disease
have evidence of a local or systemic infection, including urinary tract infection
have evidence of intrinsic sphincter deficiency as defined by a maximal urethral closure pressure of <20 cm H2O
have had a previous sub-urethral sling

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('are able to comprehend and sign a written informed consent'), Symbol('are ambulatory and able to use a toilet independently'), Symbol('are at least 18 years of age'), Symbol('are psychologically stable and suitable for interventions determined by the investigator'), Symbol('demonstrate a positive cough stress test during complex multi-channel urodynamic testing'), Symbol('demonstrate impact of stress urinary incontinence on quality of life questionnaire'), Symbol('must be FEMALE'), Symbol('must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('understand and are willing to comply with the study requirements, including agreeing to be available for the follow-up evaluations'), Not(Or(Symbol('are pregnant or planning to become pregnant during the study or in the future'), Symbol('have a bleeding condition or are on anti-coagulant therapy'), Symbol('have an elevated post-void residual (defined as PVR > 100cc)'), Symbol('have evidence of a local or systemic infection, including urinary tract infection'), Symbol('have evidence of intrinsic sphincter deficiency as defined by a maximal urethral closure pressure of <20 cm H2O'), Symbol('have had a previous sub-urethral sling'), Symbol('have immunosuppression (i.e. HIV, lymphoma)'), Symbol('have multiple sclerosis or other progressive neurological disease'), Symbol('have predominant overactive bladder symptoms'))))
